00019 #ifndef _BUFFER_HPP_cm1201105_
00020 #define _BUFFER_HPP_cm1201105_
00021 
00022 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/thread/condition.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/thread/mutex.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/thread/thread.hpp>
00027 
00028 // buffer for producer/consumer applications with
00029 //  * (almost) non-blocking insert
00030 //  * blocking get()
00031 //  * maximum size (time and types) of history 
00032 //
00033 template<typename T>
00034 class buffer {
00035 public: 
00036   typedef T data_type;
00037   typedef boost::shared_ptr<buffer<T> >    sptr;
00038   typedef boost::mutex::scoped_lock        scoped_lock;
00039   typedef boost::posix_time::ptime         ptime;
00040   typedef boost::posix_time::time_duration time_duration;
00041   typedef std::pair<ptime, data_type>      ptime_data_pair;
00042   typedef std::deque<ptime_data_pair>      list_of_packets;
00043 
00044   virtual ~buffer() {}
00045 
00046   static sptr make_buffer(size_t max_total_size,
00047                           time_duration max_queue_delay) {
00048     return sptr(new buffer(max_total_size, max_queue_delay));
00049   }
00050 
00051   // almost non-blocking insert
00052   void insert(ptime t, const data_type& dp) {
00053     scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00054     // update delay (for debugging/status display only)
00055     max_delay_ = std::max(max_delay_, delay(t));
00056     // check if buffer is too full
00057     size_t n_omit(0);
00058     if (not empty() && (total_size() > max_total_size_ || front().first+max_queue_delay_ < t)) {
00059       for (; size() > 0; ++n_omit)
00060         list_of_packets_.pop_front();
00061     }
00062     // insert data
00063     list_of_packets_.push_back(std::make_pair(t, dp));
00064     cond_.notify_one();
00065   }
00066 
00067   // blocking get method
00068   ptime_data_pair get(const time_duration timeout=boost::posix_time::seconds(1)) {
00069     scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00070     while (empty()) {
00071       cond_.timed_wait(lock, timeout);
00072       if (!run_) throw std::runtime_error("buffer exit");
00073     }
00074     const ptime_data_pair d(front());
00075     pop_front();
00076     return d;
00077   }
00078   
00079   size_t total_size() const {
00080     size_t sum(0);
00081     BOOST_FOREACH(const typename list_of_packets::value_type& lp, list_of_packets_)
00082       sum += lp.second.size();
00083     return sum;
00084   }
00085   time_duration max_delay() const { return max_delay_; }
00086 
00087   void reset_max_delay() {
00088     scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00089     max_delay_ = boost::posix_time::seconds(0);
00090   }
00091   double max_delay_msec() const {
00092     return 1e3*max_delay().ticks() / time_duration::ticks_per_second();
00093   }
00094   void stop() {
00095     scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00096     run_ = false;
00097   }
00098 protected:
00099   // the two following non-const methods are supposed to be used only when protected by a mutex
00100   void pop_front() { list_of_packets_.pop_front(); }
00101   void pop_back()  { list_of_packets_.pop_back(); }
00102   
00103   typename list_of_packets::const_reference front() const { return list_of_packets_.front(); }
00104   typename list_of_packets::const_reference back() const { return list_of_packets_.back(); }
00105 
00106   bool   empty() const { return list_of_packets_.empty(); }
00107   size_t size()  const { return list_of_packets_.size(); }
00108     
00109   time_duration delay(ptime t) const {
00110     return (empty()) ? boost::posix_time::seconds(0) : t - front().first;
00111   }
00112 private:
00113   buffer(size_t max_total_size,
00114          time_duration max_queue_delay)
00115     : max_total_size_(max_total_size)
00116     , max_queue_delay_(max_queue_delay)
00117     , max_delay_(boost::posix_time::seconds(0))
00118     , run_(true) {}
00119 
00120   buffer(const buffer<T>& );               // not implemented: only smart ptrs to be used
00121   buffer<T>& operator=(const buffer<T>& ); // not implemented: only smart ptrs to be used
00122 
00123   const size_t        max_total_size_;     // maximum total size in bytes
00124   const time_duration max_queue_delay_;    // maximum delay
00125   time_duration       max_delay_;          // current maximum delay
00126   list_of_packets     list_of_packets_;    // data
00127   boost::mutex        mutex_;              // mutex
00128   boost::condition    cond_;               // condition used to signal new data
00129   bool                run_;                // when run_==false, get() will throw an exception
00130 } ;
00131 
00132 #endif // _BUFFER_HPP_cm1201105_
